00039 class XHTMLPageTemplate extends XHTMLTemplate
00040 {
00041 //----------------------------------------------------------------- PUBLIC
00042         
00044         const TAG_BODY = 'BODY';
00045         
00047         const TAG_HEADERS = 'HEAD';
00048 
00049 //--------------------------------------------------------- Public Methods
00050     
00059     public static function ConvertIntoSGML( $source )
00060     {
00061         $newString = '';
00062         
00063         for($i = 0; $i < strlen($source); $i++) {
00064             $o = ord($source{$i});
00065             
00066             $newString .= (($o > 127)?'&#'.$o.';':$source{$i});
00067         }
00068         
00069         return $newString;
00070     } //----- End of ConvertIntoSGML
00071         
00080     public function GetBody ( )
00081     {
00082         return $this->GetTag ( self::TAG_BODY );
00083     } //----- End of GetBody
00084         
00091     public function GetHeaders ( )
00092     {
00093         return $this->GetTag ( self::TAG_HEADERS );
00094     } //----- End of GetHeaders
00095 
00096         
00110         public function Generate ( )
00111         {
00112                 return self::ConvertIntoSGML ( parent::Generate() );
00113         } //------ End of Generate
00114 
00115 //-------------------------------------------- Constructeurs - destructeur
00123         function __construct () 
00124         {
00125                 parent::__construct();
00126 
00127                 //default skeleton for XHTML1.1
00128                 $this->SetSkeleton ( 
00129 '<?xml version="1.1" encoding="iso-8859-1" standalone="no" ?>
00130 <!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.1//EN"
00131         "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml11/DTD/xhtml11.dtd">
00132         
00133 <!-- Start of XHTML Page -->
00134 <html>
00135 
00136 <!-- Start of Headers -->
00137 '. Template::BuildTag( self::TAG_HEADERS ) .'
00138 <!-- End of Headers -->
00139 
00140 <!-- Start of Body -->
00141 '. Template::BuildTag( self::TAG_BODY ) .'
00142 <!-- End of Body -->
00143 
00144 </html>
00145 <!-- End of XHTML Page -->' );
00146                 
00147                 
00148                 $this->SetTag ( self::TAG_BODY, new XHTMLBodyTemplate() );
00149                 $this->SetTag ( self::TAG_HEADERS, new XHTMLHeadersTemplate() );
00150         } //---- End of __construct
00151          
00155     function __destruct( )
00156         {       
00157                 parent::__destruct();
00158         } //----- End of Destructor
00159   
00160 //---------------------------------------------------------- Magic Methods
00169         public function __ToString ()
00170         {
00171                 return $this->Generate ( );
00172         } // End of __ToString
